name: Orbit - GMTK 2021
description:
Made for the 2021 GMTK game jam.

Gamepad needed for playing Description

A game where you control two spaceships with the gamepad left and right sticks.

When you hold the right or left triggers lasers shoot, the left (green) can collide, so it's useful for moving the crates, and the right one can cut the asteroids.

Your task is to move the crates to the top of the planet, and avoid the asteroids hitting the crates.

If you cut an asteroid, you destroy it, but it will break into pieces which can damage the crates.

There are 3 levels.

Right button is OK, 2 button is back to menu.

The right and left button (LB,RB) is for changing the orbital height.
